details.title: Responsibilities
items: Design mockups aligned with the projectâ€™s branding guidelines and user flows to fulfil business requirements.
Develop the web architecture of the startup for an agile approach.
Interview prospect interns and assess their technical knowledge.
Review codes written by other interns to maintain a clean and readable codebase.

details.title: Achievements
items: Developed a consistent and dynamic design system in Figma to develop initial layouts, and help other designers reuse the components for further developments.
Split the startup project into FE dev, BE dev, and cloud deployment, each developed by a different set of developers.
Supervised new interns to help them learn the stack, as well as frameworks such as Material UI and NextJS for FE dev, and AdonisJS and KnexJS for BE dev.
